text:
Vibrant area with many merchandises available.
ABC best bargain shop is one of the must goto shop!
Many food choices in the near vicinity as well.
And of coz, with many residents, come with congested MRT & buses......

Happening post Covid times. Very busy during peak hour and when there are street food and pop up stalls. It becomes dead quiet after 9 plus at night. Not visible from Clementi MRT station and bus interchange but just 5mins walk away surrounded by Grantral mall, clementi mall and the low level HDB flats with 1st level shops.

Clementi Mall, situated in the heart of the Clementi area, is a bustling shopping hub that's popular for its convenience and diverse range of offerings. With six floors of retail space, it serves the nearby residents, students, and professionals, offering an excellent mix of shopping, dining, and essential services.
The Fruit stall here sells like chelating..beware the price..
